Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the achievement of the United States becoming the largest energy producer in the world, as it only refers to crude oil production, not all forms of energy.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that China was the largest energy producer in 2015 and has been since 2008, according to the U.S. Energy Information Administration.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide specific data or evidence to back up the statement.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that the United States has never exported energy before, which is incorrect.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the claim, as the White House clarified that the president was referring to crude oil production, not all forms of energy.
